title: SATTVA: core package and toy attractor implemented
description: Initialized SATTVA repo, added README and theory/overview, created src/sattva with semantic_space and attractor_core, and a toy attractor experiment.

title: SATTVA: integrate small real embedding set
description: Replace hand-crafted 3D vectors with a small set of real word embeddings and rerun the toy attractor experiment.

title: SATTVA: design and implement first training objective
description: Define a simple supervised objective where the attractor core is trained so final states approximate target semantic vectors for small tasks.
